DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize rate perineal laceration nulliparous woman reduce simple change common obstetrical delivery practice , i.e. , bed delivery versus conventional delivery obstetrical stirrup .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Bed Versus Stirrups Delivery Nulliparous Women Prevention Perineal Lacerations
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial bed delivery supine position versus conventional delivery obstetrical stirrup . It include nulliparous woman present active labor L & D East ( low risk ) Unit Parkland Hospital , > 370/7 week gestation , singleton fetus cephalic presentation . The primary outcome variable perineal laceration . Secondary outcome measure include ( 1 ) 3rd 4th degree laceration ( 2 ) laceration subgroup comparison study arm .
DOC.criteria: Nulliparous woman present active labor Parkland L & D East Unit ≥ 370/7 week gestation Singleton fetus cephalic presentation ≥ 4 cm ≤ 8 cm cervical dilation No medical obstetrical complication Women obstetric medical complication pregnancy , pregnancy related hypertension , diabetes , labor induction Prior history perineal trauma require surgical repair know congenital perineal malformation NonEnglish nonSpanish speaking
